verbs.description: [ARG0: Mattis] [V: asked] [ARG2: Trump] [ARG1: to seek congressional approval for the strike] . But he wanted to be “ seen as backing up a series of bellicose tweets with action . ”
Mattis asked [ARG0: Trump] to [V: seek] [ARG1: congressional approval for the strike] . But he wanted to be “ seen as backing up a series of bellicose tweets with action . ”
Mattis asked Trump to seek congressional approval for the strike . But [ARG0: he] [V: wanted] [ARG1: to be “ seen as backing up a series of bellicose tweets with action] . ”
Mattis asked Trump to seek congressional approval for the strike . But he wanted to [V: be] “ seen as backing up a series of bellicose tweets with action . ”
Mattis asked Trump to seek congressional approval for the strike . But [ARG1: he] wanted to be “ [V: seen] [ARG2: as backing up a series of bellicose tweets with action] . ”
Mattis asked Trump to seek congressional approval for the strike . But [ARG0: he] wanted to be “ seen as [V: backing] up [ARG1: a series of bellicose tweets] [ARGM-MNR: with action] . ”
